definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Zhou Tieshan is the founder and strategist of a Chinese high-class website. In April 2002, Mr.
sentences.chinese: 周铁山先生是中国高端互联网的先行者和战略家。

sentences.english: Fei Mu, one of the great pioneers who gave China its own cinema.
sentences.chinese: 费穆，开创中国民族电影的伟大先行者之一。

sentences.english: And then there is shipping, where China has become the global leader.
sentences.chinese: 还有就是航运，在这一方面中国已经是全球的先行者。

sentences.english: The following 10 pieces of advice accumulated by forthgoers are helpful to you.
sentences.chinese: 以下是一些先行者积累的10条有益的涉世忠告。

sentences.english: End of the World community is the pioneer of e-commerce model.
sentences.chinese: 天涯社区是电子商务模式的先行者。

sentences.english: Gold was the big market mover for the trading session.
sentences.chinese: 黄金是大市场的交易时段先行者。

definition: surveyor's pole/post (used for a landmark)/CL:根[gen1]/(fig.) goal/model/benchmark
flourishing and still in the ascendant (idiom); rapidly expanding/still growing strong/on the up
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
